languages.text: "Потом я оказалась здесь — на милость господину Тервантьясу. Сначала он изучал меня, тыкал иглами, вскрывал голову и заглядывал, что там внутри, а потом... а потом заставил голоса умолкнуть. Умолкнуть! Я больше не слышу шепотки, {name}!"

"Then I wound up here, at Master Tervantias's mercy. First, he studied me, poked me with needles, opened up my head to get a look at what was inside, but then... then he made the voices stop. He made them stop! {name}, I don't hear the whispers anymore!"
languages.original_text: "Потом я оказалась здесь — на милость господину Тервантьясу. Сначала он изучал меня, тыкал иглами, вскрывал голову и заглядывал, что там внутри, а потом... а потом заставил голоса умолкнуть. Умолкнуть! Я больше не слышу шепотки, {name}!"

traits.locale_text: "Then I wound up here, at Master Tervantias's mercy. He studied me, poked me with needles, opened my head to look at what's inside, but then... then he made the voices stop. He made them stop! {name}, I don't hear the whispers anymore!"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Then I wound up here, at Master Tervantias's mercy. He studied me, poked me with needles, opened my head to look at what's inside, but then... then he made the voices stop. He made them stop! {name}, I don't hear the whispers anymore!"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Then I wound up here, at Master Tervantias's mercy. He studied me, poked me with needles, and opened my head to look at what's inside, but then... then he made the voices stop. He made them stop! {name}, I don't hear the whispers anymore!"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Then I wound up here, at Master Tervantias's mercy. He studied me, poked me with needles, and opened my head to look at what's inside, but then... then he made the voices stop. He made them stop! {name}, I don't hear the whispers anymore!"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Then I wound up here, at Master Tervantias's mercy. First, he studied me, poked me with needles, opened up my head to get a look at what was inside, but then... then he made the voices stop. He made them stop! {name}, I don't hear the whispers anymore!"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Then I wound up here, at Master Tervantias's mercy. First, he studied me, poked me with needles, opened up my head to get a look at what was inside, but then... then he made the voices stop. He made them stop! {name}, I don't hear the whispers anymore!"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「そして、テルヴァンティアス様のご慈悲のもと、私はここにたどり着いた。まず、彼は私を研究し、針で刺し、中身を調べるために頭を開いた…それで声を止めてくれたの！ 彼が止めてくれたのよ！{name}、もう囁き声は聞こえないわ！」
languages.original_text: "Then I wound up here, at Master Tervantias's mercy. First, he studied me, poked me with needles, opened up my head to get a look at what was inside, but then... then he made the voices stop. He made them stop! {name}, I don't hear the whispers anymore!"

traits.locale_text: 「そして、テルヴァンティアス様のご慈悲のもと、私はここにたどり着いた。まず、彼は私を研究し、針で刺し、中身を調べるために頭を開いた…それで声を止めてくれたの！ 彼が止めてくれたのよ！{name}、もう囁き声は聞こえないわ！」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: “于是，在特万提亚斯大师的怜悯之下，我来到了这里。他先是研究我的身体，用针扎我，还切开了我的脑袋，看看里面装着什么。可之后……之后，他让那些声音消失了。他让那些声音消失了，{name}！我再也听不到那些低语了！”
languages.original_text: "Then I wound up here, at Master Tervantias's mercy. First, he studied me, poked me with needles, opened up my head to get a look at what was inside, but then... then he made the voices stop. He made them stop! {name}, I don't hear the whispers anymore!"

traits.locale_text: “于是，在特万提亚斯大师的怜悯之下，我来到了这里。他研究我的身体，用针扎我，还切开了我的脑袋，看看里面装着什么。可之后……之后，他让那些声音消失了。他让那些声音消失了，{name}！我再也听不到那些低语了！”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: «Y acabé aquí, a merced del amo Tervantias. Primero me estudió, me atravesó con agujas y me abrió la cabeza para ver su interior, pero después... hizo que las voces se callaran. ¡Hizo que se callaran! ¡{name}, ya no oigo los susurros!».
languages.original_text: "Then I wound up here, at Master Tervantias's mercy. First, he studied me, poked me with needles, opened up my head to get a look at what was inside, but then... then he made the voices stop. He made them stop! {name}, I don't hear the whispers anymore!"

traits.locale_text: «Y acabé aquí, a merced del amo Tervantias. Me estudió, me atravesó con agujas y me abrió la cabeza para ver su interior, pero después... hizo que las voces se callaran. ¡Hizo que se callaran! ¡{name}, ya no oigo los susurros!».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Dann bin ich hier gelandet, Meister Tervantias ausgeliefert. Zuerst hat er mich studiert, hat mich mit Nadeln gestochen und meinen Kopf geöffnet, um hineinzusehen, aber dann ... dann hat er die Stimmen verstummen lassen. Er hat sie verstummen lassen! {name}, ich höre die Flüsterer nicht mehr!"
languages.original_text: "Then I wound up here, at Master Tervantias's mercy. First, he studied me, poked me with needles, opened up my head to get a look at what was inside, but then... then he made the voices stop. He made them stop! {name}, I don't hear the whispers anymore!"

traits.locale_text: "Dann bin ich hier gelandet, Meister Tervantias ausgeliefert. Er hat mich studiert, mich mit Nadeln gepiekt, und meinen Kopf geöffnet, um hineinzusehen, aber dann ... dann hat er die Stimmen verstummen lassen. Er hat sie verstummen lassen! {name}, ich höre die Flüsterer nicht mehr!"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « C'est à ce moment-là que j'ai atterri ici, entre les mains de maître Tervantias. Il m'a étudiée, m'a transpercée d'aiguilles, m'a ouvert la tête pour voir ce qu'il y avait à l'intérieur... et après... après, il a fait taire les voix. Il les a fait taire ! {name}, je n'entends plus les murmures ! »
languages.original_text: "Then I wound up here, at Master Tervantias's mercy. First, he studied me, poked me with needles, opened up my head to get a look at what was inside, but then... then he made the voices stop. He made them stop! {name}, I don't hear the whispers anymore!"

traits.locale_text: « C'est à ce moment-là que j'ai atterri ici, entre les mains de maître Tervantias. Il m'a étudiée, m'a transpercée d'aiguilles, m'a ouvert la tête pour voir ce qu'il y avait à l'intérieur... et il a fait taire les voix. Il les a fait taire ! {name}, je n'entends plus les murmures ! »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Sonra kendimi burada, Üstat Tervantias'ın insafında buldum. Önce beni inceledi: İğneler soktu, başımı açıp içindekilere göz attı. Sonra da... Sonra da sesleri susturdu. Susmalarını sağladı! Artık fısıltı duymuyorum {name}!"
languages.original_text: "Then I wound up here, at Master Tervantias's mercy. First, he studied me, poked me with needles, opened up my head to get a look at what was inside, but then... then he made the voices stop. He made them stop! {name}, I don't hear the whispers anymore!"

traits.locale_text: "Sonra kendimi burada, Üstat Tervantias'ın insafında buldum. Önce beni inceledi: İğneler soktu, başımı açıp içindekilere göz attı, sonra da... Sonra da sesleri susturdu. Susmalarını sağladı! {name}, artık fısıltı duymuyorum!"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
